page.title: 12SHOPPING
page.content:
Small family_run shops in Pilning and Severn Beach sell fresh produce and general items. Each has a Post Office. People do a large shop for the week or month in Carrefour Supermarket or go into the shopping centres of Bristol. Items like bread, milk and newspapers can be delivered to your door daily. People also shop from home using catalogues. Pictures, prices are displayed. Post off order with cash, goods delivered to your door within a week. A lazy, expensive but convenient modern way to shop!
Lee Prior
